description: Utility service to easily set all of the settings required for enabling ATCUD in Portugal (SAFT)

ClientCertificate.description: Certificate that was generated by combining the private key with the key received from AT

ClientCertificatePassword.description: Recommended, password to the client certificate

Endpoint.description: Endpoint to connect to when registering series. Use https://servicos.portaldasfinancas.gov.pt:722/SeriesWSService for TEST and https://servicos.portaldasfinancas.gov.pt:422/SeriesWSService for PRODUCTION

OrganizationUnitID.description: Organization unit to which the settings should be applied

Password.description: Password of the web service user

SigningCertificate.description: Certificate that was handed out by the AT after completing the CSR steps (.cer file)

Username.description: Username of the web service user created in the AT portal with at least WSE rights
